name: Max Steelman
text:
Covid 19 at Pizza Hut:  Thank you for allowing a customers right to choose.

To this day, the CDC has stated that Covid survival is 99.74% certain, and is â€¦More

name: Jason Lee
text: Always satisfied with the pizzas and customer service from friendly staff here. Of course, I'll be back.

name: William Johnston
text: At the first moment  you step in this place  team give you a great feeling. Very comfortable hosts, it is a kind restaurant to  pass time with your friends or with your date. Great  cooking, creative  chef, good  pay and nice  service. Warmly recommended.

name: James Williams
text: Very fast and friendly service.

name: Randy Harwood
text: Newer place with very limited seating (only three tables, each with seating for four). But  the crew was pleasant. Obviously, the pizza was fresh & hot.

name: Marty Unruh
text: Always makes my Grandsons pizza no sauce just perfect for him every time!!

name: Felion Hankerson
text:
We had an experience that was less than 1-Star. It was the first time since weâ€™ve been ordering from there, that the service was so unbelievably horrible.
On an over $30.00 bill, the pizza was so Hard that we could not eat it. â€¦More

name: Mike Blair
text: We ordered 2 pizzas. One was thin and crispy and it was over cooked to the point the crust hurt your mouth to chew and tasted like cardboard.  It tasted worse then a frozen pizza. I later that night got sick and spent today not feeling â€¦More

name: David Kosztowny
text: Lemme just start by stating, the staff is friendly, the restaurant is clean, and the food tastes great. I love that the staff takes your order personally. If they don't get your food to you at the promised time, they genuinely seem upset. â€¦More

name: Bob Bercel
text: Really good, havent been at a pizza hut in 15 years. Havent had one around. It was excellent. Thank you

name: Mark McCallum
text: I had a large supreme pan pizza and it was delicious. I also see that they have lunch specials for around $5 for a personal pizza and pop that's pretty good deal

name: Nancy Beaudua
text: Fast service with fresh made to order pizza

name: Ashley Scheidt-King
text: We order frequently. More times than not the pizza arrives as ordered and is decent quality. On occassion it's really awesome.

name: Shashank K
text: This place makes way better pizzas than the one on Lapeer in Port Huron. The pizzas are fluffy and crispy and they add the right amount of flavor to the crust rim. Worth the drive.

name: Karen Woolman
text: Quick service, great pizza

name: Adam Muldermans
text: Staff is always very friendly, I liked their menu better before they got rid of the poppers.

name: Samang Maio
text: Pizza Hut driver flips me off in a black truck with the back trunk cover. The delivery guy almost backed into me as I was pulling around to Taco Bell. I honked at him to let him know, hey Iâ€™m behind you, thinking he didnâ€™t see me. THEN HE â€¦More

name: Barb Moses
text: St. Clair Pizza Hut always has great pizza and the staff is very friendly!

name: Heather Taylor
text: Amazing food, fast service. The manager was prompt with a minor issue. Great customer service !! ðŸ˜Š

name: Melodee Beals
text: This Pizza Hut always does a nice job! The food comes out correctly and the service is very good.

name: Agustin Ulloa
text: Always get what you ask for. My order has yet to be wrong. The staff is always friendly. What more do you want from a pizza joint???

name: Kayla Stark
text: Awesome pizza. Awesome service. Very clean store.

name: Steven Kerszykowski
text: Good pizza and nice people

name: Kimberley Kelley
text: Very clean and friendly staff

text: Had a pizza there today it was awesome !   Wink wink ðŸ˜‰ by Peter Michael Photography Studio of St Clair

name: dan hensley
text: just like the other pizza places. no place for a family to go in and eat pizza. pizza hut has always been a sit down pizza place not a order and take it home to eat it will not go back again
